attributes.action: scrap any plans to reduce minimum wage in NI, Scotland, Wales and the north east of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to BBC News website, Mr Brown is believed to be considering plans which could see the minimum wage reduced in Northern Ireland, Scotland, Wales and NE of England. There is already enough of a difficulty in encouraging people to come off benefits and go out to work. These new plans can only hinder this further. In my opinion I can not see how this plan could improve the economy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
